fields.name: Rental Started
fields.message_template: Your powerbank {{powerbank_id}} rental has started at {{station_name}}. Return within {{max_hours}} hours.

fields.name: Rental Ending Soon
fields.message_template: Your powerbank {{powerbank_id}} rental expires in {{remaining_hours}} hours. Find a ChargeGhar station to return.

fields.name: Rental Completed
fields.message_template: Thank you! Your powerbank {{powerbank_id}} has been returned. Total cost: Rs. {{total_cost}}

fields.name: Rental Overdue
fields.message_template: Your powerbank {{powerbank_id}} is {{overdue_hours}} hours overdue. Additional charges of Rs. {{penalty_amount}} apply.

fields.name: Rental Auto-Completed
fields.message_template: Your powerbank {{powerbank_id}} rental has been auto-completed due to extended overdue period. Total charges: Rs. {{total_cost}}

fields.name: Payment Success
fields.message_template: Rs. {{amount}} payment via {{gateway}} was successful. Transaction ID: {{transaction_id}}

fields.name: Payment Failed
fields.message_template: Your payment of Rs. {{amount}} via {{gateway}} failed. Reason: {{failure_reason}}

fields.name: Wallet Recharged
fields.message_template: Your wallet has been recharged with Rs. {{amount}}. New balance: Rs. {{new_balance}}

fields.name: Payment Overdue Charges
fields.message_template: Overdue charges of Rs. {{amount}} have been applied to your rental.

fields.name: Admin Balance Added
fields.message_template: Rs. {{amount}} has been added to your wallet. New balance: Rs. {{new_balance}}. Reason: {{reason}}

fields.name: Refund Approved
fields.message_template: Your refund request for Rs. {{amount}} has been approved. The amount will be credited to your wallet.

fields.name: Refund Rejected
fields.message_template: Your refund request for Rs. {{amount}} has been rejected. Reason: {{admin_notes}}

fields.name: Welcome New User
fields.message_template: Hi {{user_name}}, welcome to Nepal's largest powerbank network! Your account is verified and ready to use.

fields.name: KYC Approved
fields.message_template: Your KYC verification is complete! You can now rent powerbanks and enjoy all ChargeGhar benefits.

fields.name: Maintenance Notice
fields.message_template: ChargeGhar will undergo maintenance on {{maintenance_date}} from {{start_time}} to {{end_time}}. Service may be temporarily unavailable.

fields.name: Rental Anomalies Alert
fields.message_template: {{anomaly_count}} rental anomalies detected. Please review immediately.

fields.name: Account Status Updated
fields.message_template: Hi {{user_name}}, your account status has been updated to {{status}}. {{reason}}

fields.name: Coupon Performance Alert
fields.message_template: {{underperforming_count}} coupons are underperforming. Consider reviewing their terms or promotion strategy.

fields.name: Special Offer
fields.message_template: {{offer_description}} Valid until {{expiry_date}}. Use code: {{promo_code}}

fields.name: Coupon Applied
fields.message_template: You've successfully applied coupon '{{coupon_code}}' and received {{points}} points!

fields.name: Coupon Expiring Soon
fields.message_template: Don't miss out! Coupon '{{coupon_code}}' expires in {{days_until_expiry}} days. Use it now to get {{points_value}} points!

fields.name: New Coupon Available
fields.message_template: Use coupon '{{coupon_code}}' to get {{points_value}} points! Valid until {{expiry_date}}.

fields.name: Points Earned
fields.message_template: {{reason}} - You earned {{points}} points! Your total balance is now {{total_points}} points.

fields.name: Achievement Unlocked
fields.message_template: Congratulations! You've unlocked '{{achievement_name}}' and earned {{points}} points!

fields.name: Leaderboard Update
fields.message_template: You're currently ranked #{{rank}} on the leaderboard! Keep up the great work!

fields.name: Points Milestone
fields.message_template: Congratulations! You've reached {{milestone}} points!

fields.name: Welcome Email
fields.message_template: Hi {{username}}, welcome to ChargeGhar! We are excited to have you on board.

fields.name: OTP SMS
fields.message_template: Your ChargeGhar {{purpose}} OTP is: {{otp}}. Valid for {{expiry_minutes}} minutes. Do not share this code.

fields.name: Profile Completion Reminder
fields.message_template: Complete your profile to unlock all ChargeGhar features and start renting power banks!

fields.name: Fines and Dues
fields.message_template: A late return fee of Rs. {{amount}} has been charged. Reason: {{reason}}

fields.name: OTP Email
fields.message_template: Your ChargeGhar {{purpose}} verification code is: {{otp}}. This code is valid for {{expiry_minutes}} minutes. Do not share this code with anyone.

fields.name: KYC Status Update
fields.message_template: Your KYC verification status has been updated to {{kyc_status}}. {% if rejection_reason %}Reason: {{rejection_reason}}{% endif %}

fields.name: Account Status Update
fields.message_template: Your account status has been updated to {{new_status}}. {% if reason %}Reason: {{reason}}{% endif %}

fields.name: Payment Status
fields.message_template: Your payment of Rs. {{amount}} has been {{status}}. {% if transaction_id %}Transaction ID: {{transaction_id}}{% endif %}

fields.name: Social Auth Welcome
fields.message_template: Hi! Welcome to ChargeGhar! You've successfully signed up using {{provider}}. Your account is ready to use - start renting powerbanks today!

fields.name: Achievement Claimed
fields.message_template: Congratulations! You've claimed '{{achievement_name}}' and earned {{points}} points! Your total is now {{total_points}} points.

fields.name: Bulk Achievements Claimed
fields.message_template: Amazing! You've claimed {{count}} achievements: {{achievement_names}}. Total points earned: {{total_points}}!

fields.name: App Update Available
fields.message_template: Version {{version}} is now available for {{platform}}. {{#is_mandatory}}This is a mandatory update. Please update now to continue using ChargeGhar.{{/is_mandatory}}{{^is_mandatory}}Update now to get the latest features and improvements!{{/is_mandatory}}
